message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of associating image regions with text queries, which is a common task in computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a discriminative approach using a bimodal neural network, which involves training a classifier with negative samples, suggesting that it could also belong to the sub-category cs.CL (Computation and Language). The use of neural networks and machine learning techniques also suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper also establishes an evaluation protocol for natural-language visual detection, which could place it in the sub-category cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
